start.state: Strip poker? Well now, someone's forward.
Sure I won't be too much for your heart to handle?
Think you can handle an alien?
I'm warning you--I can handle myself in these kinds of places.
Let's see what Earth people are made of...and if they've got any luck.
Is this how you vulgar Earth girls pass the time? How depraved.

case.state: Come on, ~name~, you can do better than that.
And a layer comes off! How exciting.
Just what could Earth women be hiding? The battle scars of having sex with men?
Now you've got me trying to count how many layers all my crewmates wear.
Would you like me to loan some layers? It looks like you're going to need them, honey.
Tough luck, ~name~. But any good woman bounces back from a loss or two!
Poor little Earth girl. Don't worry, I won't make fun of your body too much.
Back-to-back shots always sting the most.
I won with that? This is gonna be a breeze.
I know damn well I shouldn't have won with that...you Earth people are never gonna see me naked.
Oh, wow. A high card is enough to beat you people? You'd better enjoy the way I look now.
...Yeah, listen. I've got more layers than it seems, so you'd better hope me winning with a high card was a fluke.
And they say men are tall! You're enough woman for the whole table, sweetie.
You said you don't get out much? Guess men like short women...that makes things awkward for me.
You know, I tend to turn heads with my height alone. Better not invite you to the ship, or you'll steal my thunder.
From what I know of men, you're as tall as one...and built like them, too. Don't worry, you wear it well--so does Gascogne!
Hibiki's a teenie-weenie man I know. I guess you represent the opposite end of the spectrum on both counts.
Well, howdy, pardner, how d'ya--do...
What are you lugging that big men's gun around for--ack!
Well, aren't you spunky! You even brought a model g--eek!
Uh...where are you pointing that thing? Are you--wait--eek! Don't!
Ooh! Ooh! Are you doing it again? Do it again!
Ooh, Aimee's turn! Show us that trick again!
Aimee! You're so cool! How do you shoot like that? Do that trick again!
Give us a show, girl! That last time was incredible!
I'd call you crazy for this sort of thing, but how could I when you defy death like it's nothing?
You're just so awesome! I can't get enough of this!
Can you do it a third time, hotshot? Yeah, probably.
I could watch you do this all day. My heart jumps every time!
Uh, Aimee? Are you sure you want to keep doing that? You nearly got hit last time...and your targets are getting smaller.
Um, it's OK, Aimee! You've been very impressive! Just go out on top, you know?
...Are you sure about this, Aimee? After...last time? Don't kill yourself...
Uh--don't go all the way just for my sake. What you did was cool, but, um...well, you'll be fine.
Well, I guess if you've come this far, you might as well finish the job. Go for it.
I'd expect nothing less, cutie. Be sure to wow us!
Might as well seal the deal, even if it's just your thong. You can do it, honey!
Seems we've got similar taste in underwear. Shame you're about to shoot it right off, but at least it'll look cool.
That tan is something else, and your energy is boundless! Most Mejarians opt for pale, as you can see...
Barnette's kind of tan like you are. She's cute, too, so women can pull it off!
Slow down there, tiger. That energy is going to turn you into a tan smear on the ground.
Tan is certainly a look on Mejare, but pale is the norm for us...where'd you say you were from? Planet Austria?
...Are you alright there, honey? With the knife and all?
...You know, I carry the rapier mostly for fashion...maybe you could relegate that knife to the same thing?
...Could you maybe put down the knife, sweetheart? Hey, are you listening?
What a weirdo...knives are just as deadly as swords, with none of the style.
Better keep my sword on hand, with this nutcase on the scene.
Hey, hey, hey! Check out the all-purple look. That's a new one...
Hey, honey, color contrasts show confidence. Would I look nearly as stunning if this dress matched my hair?
Purple hair's certainly got an exotic appeal...too bad mine is boring old blonde. As for the matching outfit, I don't follow the logic.
Quite the exotic color scheme you've got there, sweetie. Too bad you forgot to mix it up at all.
You're pale as marble, dearie! Do they not have a sun on this "Japan" planet?
Are you...flickering? Are you some kind of hologram? That might explain your skin tone.
You OK there, sweetheart? You look a little pale...and non-corporeal.
And I thought Mejarians liked the pale look! This "Japan" planet puts us to shame.
Check out that outfit! Going for the natural look? So would I, if Mejare had much of nature.
Did you just piece that outfit together from bits you found in a forest? It doesn't even look that bad, but...it's certainly all-natural.
If only Mejare had the same verdant natural resources as Earth. Perhaps then I could try to emulate your all-natural style.
Mejare's a little too wasteful to have the greenery for me to dress like you do. You can see how little we wear to compensate.
Hey, girlie, someone told me you're a model on Earth...is that true? I'd like to get in on that...
You're pretty cute, honey, but I hear people like legs on their models...better hope I don't hit the scene.
Hey now, sweetheart. You're cute, but there's no need to brag about being a model...not when a Mejarian's on the scene.
Don't be so full of yourself, Miss Model...I'd be a model, too, if not for Mejare's pesky little corrupt government.
Is that so? Well, Ami, you've got to let me know how to become an Earth model. I'm a bit of an outlaw on Mejare, after all.
Thanks for the tip, Meia. Leave it to you to gather a little intel on our friends here...how's life as an Earth model, honey?
Ooh, she's a model? Now I'm curious...that was always my dream job, after all.
You're, uh, looking a little pink there. And what's up with those ears?
I know I joke about Earth girls being aliens, but, uh, you really do look kind of weird. What's with all the...fur?
Wait, did they say you're a...a hedgehog or something? Is that some kind of animal? That would explain the, uh, pink...and ears.
...I really can't make heads or tails of you. You kind of look like you should have a tail, what with that fur and all.
Ooh, you're into art? Do you think you could paint a portrait of me? Maybe frame it in your collection to capture my eternal beauty?
Ooh, so you're an artist? I know a particularly handsome man that can paint, too...think you could capture me better?
Did you say you go to school with men? I was never that big on school--except for art, where we could finally appreciate beauty!
Students tend to be such bores--like that egghead Parfet. But an art student? Now we're talking--my whole body is art!
How's a young little thing like you a model if you're still in school? I've got modeling potential, but it's hard for pirates to land a job.
A student and a model? And here I am, with all my beauty, and still a lowly criminal. At least I have my wonderful piloting skills.
If only my circumstances let me be the beautiful model I've always dreamed of being! Guess I'll have to settle for death-defying pirate.
You're a lucky one, Earth-girl. I never had the benefit of much schooling, nor the opportunity to be a model. So cherish what you've got!
Hey there, Plain-Jane. What's brought you here, with all your layers? Looking to overcome some shyness?
Exhibit A of Earth girls' ridiculous conservatism. Can't you appreciate your own body instead of hiding it? Must be men doing this to you.
What's up, cutie? You seem to be making every effort to hide that cuteness, actually. Just look at those packed-on layers.
I guess I'd be a little shyer about my body if I had your height and plain looks, but come on. Confidence makes any woman look better!
Hey there, short stuff. I think you might actually be shorter than Hibiki, which is a challenge even for women.
You said you fight "Titans"? I imagine that's everyone, considering your stature.
"Titans," huh? You mean like me next to you? Or anyone, really?
How's the weather down there, at the very bottom of Earth? You really need to drink your milk, honey.
...See, this is why I'm going to be the Fama for Barnette. I don't want our daughters growing up all short from lack of milk.
Ooh, do you really report the news? Be sure to get my good side--oh wait, that's every side!
Hey there, Jumpsuit. Someone said you're a reporter--but this pirate doesn't mind a little publicity!
I've been in the media for much worse than a few glory shots, so don't think I'm afraid of that camera, newsgirl.
Hey, newsie, I've got all the story you need right here. Your Earth viewers have never seen a body like mine!
Hey, what's all this about the middle of Earth? Is there a spot underground that only you elf-people get to live in?
And I call Meia pale. You look almost ghostly...is that just the way you elves are?
Hey, what's up with those pointy ears? And the pale, Meia-like skin? You're a strange one, "elf" girl.
So you call yourself an elf, right? Is that another word for "Earthling with crazy ears"? Because you look human otherwise.
Hey, what's all this about the middle of Earth? Is there a spot underground that only you elf-people get to live in?
And I call you pale, Meia. Arwen here looks almost ghostly...is that just the way elves are?
Hey, what's up with those pointy ears? And that pallid skin? You're a strange one, "elf" girl.
So you call yourself an elf, right? Is that another word for "Earthling with crazy ears"? Because you look human otherwise.
What'd you say you lived in? An M-M-O--ripgah? I can't keep track of all that.
Did you say you lived in a computer or something like that? Sounds like Heaven to Parfet, with how much she tinkers with machines.
So what's it like inside a computer? Do you have to wear a rubber suit to avoid getting electrocuted?
You live inside a game, right? And now you're playing a game? Is this whole place a game I've stepped inside?
I really thought I'd be the most lightly-dressed woman here, but there you go showing me up on that front.
Way to dispel my stereotypes of Earth girls being overdressed. You wear even less than I do.
Hey, I understand wanting to show a little skin, but you can't walk around in a bikini all day. Even Barnette doesn't go that far.
Even my darling little Barnette covers herself up better than you do...and she's got a reputation for dressing flimsily.
...You OK there, schoolgirl? You look a little on edge...especially when you look my way.
Looking a little bug-eyed there, honey. Too much coffee this morning?
Uh, you OK, Ayano? Your eyes are all shifty, like somebody's watching you.
...Could you settle down there, girlie? You're giving me the stink-eye like I killed someone. It's creeping me out.
Normally I'd say rock the skin color you have, but wow. Pink is not an attractive color...not that pink.
And here I thought Mejarians were the ones with the exotic body colors. Earth girls are breaking out the bright pink skin!
Why's your skin all gross-looking and pink? Like, <i.really pink. It's distracting...so is that eyepatch, too.
Not to be outdone, Earth starts showing this Mejarian just how bizarre its colors can truly get. Next on the agenda: pink skin.
Oho--a fellow blonde! Good to see them running around on Earth--we've got to stick together!
Hey there, cutie! Always good to see more lovely blonde women running around. Got to keep each other safe from those jealous brunettes.
Ooh, is blonde your natural color? It's not as exotic as some of Mejare's other hair colors, but it's certainly appealing to be wrapped in gold.
What, was "Blonde Canary" taken? Because that's what I would advertise, if I were you.
I was gonna say something about that cool dark skin, but apparently...you're just some sort of image? What's that about?
You're..."virtual"? Listen, honey, you can't just assume we know what these things mean. Piloting's a busy life, you know!
Wait, so you're not really here, and you're some kind of "virtual" avatar? Earth has really gotten advanced from all the technology they keep stealing.
Hey, if we can just use computers to project ourselves here, why didn't anyone tell me? I had to fly all the way here!
Ooh, the black-and-white look is a classic! Very striking and confident with that contrast. And such a cute little bow!
Maybe it's just me, but you've got a Mejarian sense of style! Clashing colors, nice and sexy and revealing! A woman after my own heart.
Ooh, that's a cute outfit, Blake! I love this dress, but I don't have anything quite as fancy as all that clashing-colors business.
Mmm...the lace, the contrast, the heels! I like your style, Blake! Not bad for an Earth girl.
Way to go and expose your entire midriff there, Blake. Who do you think you are, Dita? Me?
Nice vest you're rocking there, honey. But you forgot to cover up your midsection...like me.
Taking a few fashion tips from me, are you, Blake? What with that midriff fully on display and all.
Well, aren't you looking more exposed than usual? But as far as exposure goes, the midsection's a good choice.
Do you seriously fight those "vampire" things? I mean, you just don't look all that imposing.
Ooh, you're kind of cute! Is that how you kill "vampires"? Just making them let their guard down with your adorable face?
So what's it take to kill these "vampires"? Can't you just get the military to shoot them or something? You don't seem all that special.
For a girl called "Buffy," you sure seem awful willowy. You do have a cute face, so maybe that's your strategy for killing those vampire things.
What's up, Miss Pantsuit? You sure laugh a lot for someone dressed so prim-and-proper.
You some kind of businesswoman, Miss Yuck-it-up? How could such an esteemed professional be so depraved as to play this?
Hey there, Chuckles! You look more conservative than I've ever dreamed of being...and yet here you are, stripping with me.
Something funny, Miss Formalwear? Make sure this nasty pirate doesn't put a ransom on your very professional head.
Yeesh. Being as beautiful as I am, I try to let other girls down easy, but...you're hard to look at.
...Ew. I really can't tell where your face begins and your body ends.
...It's times like these that I really appreciate how fortunate I am to be born this beautiful. Take a look at the alternative.
As if you weren't ugly enough, you've got this horrible look in your eyes. What's your problem?
You know, I'd call Meia the strong, silent type...but she still speaks occasionally.
Slow on the uptake? The "strong, silent type" doesn't mean literally never speaking, you know.
Oh, don't feel bad. I know you're speechless at the sight of me--but I'll do enough talking for both of us!
Stunned into speechlessness? I'm flattered, but really, honey, you can talk to me. I won't mind.
Hey, Chell. If I'm the most gorgeous woman you've ever met, don't say anything.
See, Meia, I think you do the "strong, silent type" thing pretty well. Chell here is an example of taking it too far.
Slow on the uptake? The "strong, silent type" doesn't mean literally never speaking, you know.
Oh, don't feel bad. I know you're speechless at the sight of me--but I'll do enough talking for both of us!
Stunned into speechlessness? I'm flattered, but really, honey, you can talk to me. I won't mind.
Hey, Chell. If I'm the most gorgeous woman you've ever met, don't say anything.
Hey, Eyebags, you gonna stay awake all game? You look like you're drifting away already.
Talk about never leaving the house. You look like you've never seen sunlight--and you're dozing off as we speak!
Gotta be honest, sweetie--between the pale skin and the vacant look in your eyes, you're really reminding me of a zombie.
So do you work super hard all day at your job? Why do you look all gaunt and drowsy? Get some beauty sleep, woman.
...You know, I was shown films as a girl about how men were horrible monsters. You're about what they looked like in those.
Ew! Eek! G-get away! Stop! What are you?
...I really came here to meet some Earth women. Not...whatever this is supposed to be. Besides terrifying.
...What the hell am I looking at? I wanted some cute girls, not a--a mechanical monstrosity!
You're a robot? So like, you're Pyoro if he were designed by a blind woman?
Ooh, you've got quite the set of muscles on you. Shame Meia's not here. She'd totally melt right in front of you!
Check out those legs, hot stuff! You look like you could lift up the whole table with those things alone--good thing Meia's not here to fawn over you.
Omigosh, you should meet Meia, my boss--she's really icy, but women with muscles totally get her going. And she'd try not to show it!
Hey, Miss Muscles, you into women? Because my squadron leader Meia is all about exercise, and she desperately needs a girlfriend.
Oh, dear. I can see where this is going, Ice Queen.
Flirting, are we Meia? I figured as much. Best to let the lovebirds just figure things out on their own.
Meia, honey, you're just setting yourself up for disappointment. Earth girls don't like each others' bodies the way we do.
Ooh, you're so cute when a woman actually gets you going! She'll deny it now, Chun, but Meia here is totally into you.
A witcher, eh? Is that Earth dialect for witch? Because I got called a witch for possession of Duero's sex book.
Is it witcher or witch? Or, shall I say, which is it?
So is a "witcher" even witchier than a witch? I've been called a witch just for wanting to see what men have got in their pants.
Forgive me for not being impressed with the term "witcher." How could I be when all it takes for that on Mejare is a libido?
Ooh, you're a cutie! Yet surprisingly sturdy on your feet, what with all that armor. Don't bowl me right over!
Hi there, darling! You must be pretty tough to lug all that armor around. Afraid I'll stab you?
What's with that armor, sweetheart? You'd be a lot cuter without it...I know I'm a pirate, but I'd never kill someone as cute as you.
Adorable hairstyle, cute face--but all that armor! You a soldier, dear? Oh, please forgive my horrid piracy!
Where'd you say you were from? Planet Korea? Well then, it seems Korea and Mejare share a fashion sense...
You're a cutie, Miss Bodysuit, if a little on the short side. Is that just how they make women over on Planet Korea?
If only Meia were here. She dresses just like you do, D.Va...we should find out who wears it better!
You're an adorable little thing, D.Va! All wrapped up in that cute bodysuit, just like a certain other pilot I know.
I don't even know you, girlie, but you seem dressed up for a special occasion all the same. Feeling sexy today?
Hey, cutie. Is it a holiday on planet Korea? Because you look different from usual.
This "Korea" planet of yours has got quite the range of fashion. I swear I've seen you running around in something else.
What's up, D.Va? That's a cute outfit--but it doesn't seem quite like your usual fare. What's the occasion?
Where'd you say you were from? Planet Korea? Well then, it seems Korea and Mejare share a fashion sense...
You're a cutie, Miss Bodysuit, if a little on the short side. Is that just how they make women over on Planet Korea?
Well, everyone, cards on the table. Who wears the whole bodysuit look better--D.Va or my miserable old boss here?
You're an adorable little thing, D.Va! All wrapped up in that cute bodysuit, just like another pilot I know...who might be sitting here.
Ohoho. Miss Boring-old-Brunette puts on a fancy store-bought dress and suddenly thinks she's better than the rest of us.
So, "Princesses" are like rulers, right? So what makes you so special, girlie?
I've never subscribed to the idea of royalty. What, some plain-jane with a chip on her shoulder just decides she's better than me?
So what if I had to steal my dress? I'm still more beautiful than Miss Too-Big-for-her-Brooches here, with her servants and fancy title.
Oh good, a fellow blonde...and tall, too. Wasn't sure Earth girls could fit either category.
You're not a bad looker yourself, honey. Must be our wonderful blonde genetics that inform the rest of our bodies!
You solve mysteries, is that right? Well...there's no mystery about how wonderful it is to be blonde.
Ho-hum. Another blonde in a dress...I'm just kidding, you're still cute.
Way to half-ass your outfit, honey. You look like you picked out whatever fell on you when you opened your closet!
...So is the "zero-effort" look how you attract Earth men? Have I been going at this all wrong?
I should have known--men are too simple to understand complex outfits, so they respond better to cobbled-together looks like yours.
Gotta be honest here, sweetheart--you don't look like the type to be playing this. Those glasses aren't helping you pick out appealing clothes.
...Can I maybe just call you "DMG" for short? Because Dark Magician Girl is a hell of a mouthful.
...Don't you have an actual name? You know, like the one your Fama gives you?
You've really got to give yourself a snappier nickname, dearie...men aren't bright enough to remember that many words.
If you really are a magician, color me interested...but that clunky name could use a shortening or two.
What'd you say you raised? Those little Poker--whatevers? Is that why you're playing this game?
Hey, dearie, that exotic blue hair will take you further than weird animal training--you should be a model for shampoo or something.
Mejare has barely any animals at all, so this whole "pokey-mon" thing is lost on me. And they just do whatever you say?
So could you train men the way you do these poker-whatevers? Because that would be quite interesting...
And what do we have here? An Earth pirate? And with a sword, to boot! Interesting...
I see even Earth pirates understand the subtle elegance of a blade! And you've got some luxurious hair yourself.
Oho--a fellow pirate? I'd absolutely love to have a drink later--maybe you could teach me how to handle my sword better.
Well, now! You Earth pirates don't dress like we do on Mejare--but your choice of weapon isn't too far off. Can you show me around?
Little Miss Princess wants to play strip poker, does she? Well, I hope you don't mind if this nasty pirate holds you hostage.
Looking a little out of your element, Miss Blueblood. Gonna prove that you're really better than the rest of us like your title implies?
Look at Miss Princess, lugging around a scepter just to prove she's better than the peons. We'll see how you enjoy stripping down like us.
Royals really get on my nerves, you know...mostly because I'm not one, despite actually being better-looking.
Oh? And what do we have here, besides the most adorably shy little woman I've ever seen?
Such a cutie...and in a traditional-looking dress! Hard to believe someone so shy would even be here.
Something wrong, honey? You've hardly been looking me in the eye. It's OK, I don't bite.
Why so shy, Elizabeth? Confidence makes women ten times as beautiful--just look at me!
So what's your story? You can cast magic spells or something? If it's true, sign me up--it'll be another wonderful thing about me!
Some might call my beauty magical...I'm inclined to agree.
Hey, honey. Cast a spell on me...one that makes me even prettier. Now that would be magic!
Alright, I've seen enough crazy Paksis-magic to believe your tales. But why don't you put your money where your mouth is?
Beautiful hair, makeup, spacefaring? With both of us running around, this table's going to get sick of the archetype.
Do we have a fellow star-crossing seductress on our hands? I'm not sure there's enough meat for both of us.
Hey, good-lookin'. Trying to steal my thunder with the "seductress-from-space" angle? I don't mind--I like women, too.
You didn't doll yourself up like that just to please some men, did you? Come show this fellow spacefarer what you can do.
Hey, Kitty-cat. You're supposed to strip during the game, not before it.
Nice Halloween costume, Kitty, but maybe you should have picked something a little more complex for this game.
Not too interested in winning, huh, Kitty-cat? Unless you've brought some yarn-balls you plan on counting.
I only know about cats from Mejare's zoos...they only showed the females, of course. But they were definitely more covered than you are.
So, Miss Kitty, you, uh, going to shave your bottom fur now? ...I'd like that.
Knowing that that's fur now makes me really want to see you shaved...Mejare likes shaving.
Is the bottom fur going now? Because I hate hair...except on the head.
Please tell me you're shaving everything else. That's sort of the style on Mejare, so it's what I know.
Dear god, girl, you'd cower if a light breeze rolled in. What's the big deal with a little exposure?
You are just so cute. How do you feel about women, little Miss? Do my breasts bother you?
Shy around nudity, sweetie? Did the big, bad Earth men beat this into you? Just enjoy yourself...
You're such a nervous wreck that I just feel bad for teasing you. Way to ruin my fun.
Jeez, you're terrified. Maybe men do eat women's livers.
...Are men actually anything to be afraid of? Sure, they're big and lumbering, but they seem kind of slow.
Calm down, would you? Yeesh. Maybe Mejare was right about men, considering the state they've got this girl in.
Hey, I've dealt with my fair share of male soldiers. They're nothing to be super afraid of...too stupid.
Jeez, what a head case. Good thing she's got her girlfriend here to keep her in check.
Running, running, running. We're not trying to kill you here, you know.
Time for take two, everyone. Better than the first, perhaps?
And there she goes. Poor little thing, beaten down by the world.
What's up, Four-Feet-Four-Eyes? You look like someone brought you here at gunpoint.
Oh, look, the egghead love child of Parfet and Dita--nerdy and and eccentric! How's the weather at the bottom of the earth?
I keep trying to look over your outfit, but my eyes just keep moving too fast and missing it. Did your Fama not produce milk, shorty?
You're such a cute little bespectacled spectacle--but damn if you don't look eleven. Where's the other two feet of your body?
What's your story, Miss Highlights? Got any gum to share?
Hey, toss me a piece of that gum, cutie. I could use a snack while you tell me all about your "San Fransokyo" planet.
Just gonna blow bubbles all day, or are you actually going to strip? Either way, I wouldn't mind having some myself...
You seem a little sour, Miss Gumball. If those bubbles aren't cheering you up, just give me the rest to chew.
I understand, dear. You're so stunned by my beauty that you hid your own face in shame. I'm sure you're still cute!
Don't hide that pretty little face on my account, honey. You've certainly got a beautiful figure.
Nice little bodysuit you've got there, even if you plan on being the Masked Woman. I know a sugar-and-ice girl with your fashion sense.
You've got a lot of sass for someone who won't show her face, Miss Masked. Hiding some grisly injury, or just your own embarrassment?
I understand, dear. You're so stunned by my beauty that you hid your own face in shame. I'm sure you're still cute!
Don't hide that pretty little face on my account, honey. You've certainly got a beautiful figure.
Look, Meia, a girl with your fashion sense--though apparently she needs a mask to match your sheer lack of emotion.
You've got a lot of sass for someone who won't show her face, Miss Masked. Hiding some grisly injury, or just your own embarrassment?
...Look, honey. Makeup is a girl's best friend, but...it's possible to get a little too close to your friends.
Dear god. Did you break into your Fama's makeup closet and start applying whatever you could find? Your friends are letting you down.
I guess I never appreciated how light with makeup I can be with my natural beauty. Here we see the alternative...
Check out Miss Makeup over here. Somehow she made it through childhood without hearing the expression "less is more."
Check out that messy hair...and adorable student outfit! Did you say you're a witch?
Watch out, ladies, we've got a full-blown magician on our hands. On Mejare you get called a witch for saying men aren't the worst thing ever.
A witch, eh? Forgive my doubts...that jealous old hag of a judge called me a witch just for having that anatomy book!
Awww! She even brought a little magic wand to complete the costume! You're so cute, Miss Witch.
Between you and that time I got called a witch for showing interest in men, witches are just irresistible these days.
So what are these "ninjas" all about, huh? Disappearing into the night doesn't sound useful in a game like this.
Don't tell me your going to use those ninja skills to hide your body, now.
Certainly an impressive profile, Miss Ninja. Think you could show us just how impressive?
Does "ninja" just mean you wear a headband? Sounds like a lofty title for my Barnette to accidentally fall under.
Hey, dearie, no reason to come out knives-swinging. I've got my rapier sheathed like a civilized woman.
Settle down there, honey. There's something awfully scary about wearing a smile with a knife out.
I know I brought a sword, sweetheart, but that was just for fashion. Don't turn this place into a bloodbath.
Well, hi there, cutie--er, uh, knife-wielding cutie. Yeah. Carry on.
What's up, sourpuss? You look even more miserable than a certain squadron leader I know.
Hey, lighten up, girlie. I didn't come all the way to Earth to find what I could get from Meia's strategy lectures.
Yawn...are you really going to be a miserable bore this whole time? Would having my breasts make you feel better?
Looks like it's Little Miss Sunshine's turn to strip. Good thing Meia's not here, or this table would just freeze over.
What's up, sourpuss? You look even more miserable than a certain squadron leader I know...the one right next to us.
Hey, lighten up, girlie. I could have gotten this mood from playing poker with Meia back on the ship.
Yawn...are you really going to be a miserable bore this whole time? Would having my breasts make you feel better?
Looks like it's Little Miss Sunshine's turn to strip. Between you and Meia here, the energy's just through the roof.

Hey, I follow orders! I'm just trying to help Meia come out of her shell a little...and maybe find a girlfriend.
Talk about rude, Misato. Name one time I didn't do my job when it counted--it's not my fault Meia's so miserable.
Hey, we're not piloting right now! It's just a little friendly teasing between girls who've been through a lot together.
Hey, Meia's not ranked that much higher than me. And I take my Leader seriously when we're out in battle!
You Earth people really are tough, beating me with two pair...better get creative.
Jeez, two pair lost? I better be a little more seductive...
Wow. If two pair is losing, you might be the types I need my sword for.
Again? You Earth girls must be annoyed at all the little trinkets you see on me.
Tagged me again, but let's remember who's winning.
Do I smell a comeback? Can't be...that would mean I'd lose.
That's the spirit, ladies. Claw your way back, so I can claw at myself later.
Guess counting my rapier didn't miff you, because you haven't been putting up much of a fight.
Quite the streak I had there. Maybe I'm better when that sword isn't weighing me down.
Lucky streak and I'm still winning? Tonight's my night...or wait, every night is my night.
Here I am, still so clothed, and so skilled. Surrounded by Earthlings struggling to tread water...or keep their clothes on.
Expect more losses, ~name~. We Mejarians are clever women.
There's more where that came from. I've handled Mejarian soldiers, you know.
Don't get nervous, ~name~. I know, I'm tall, beautiful, and intelligent.
Oh, good. Fashion tips and more time to think about how many pieces my outfit is.
I live in artificial gravity...so I can understand your situation, so to speak.
Put your back into it, ~name~. What self-respecting woman is no good at cards?
Come on, don't they have cards on Earth? It's Gascogne's favorite way to get to know you.
What's wrong? Have you realized how many trinkets I have and are just throwing in the towel?
Did I ever tell you how sweet I've found Earthlings to be? Going and losing for me when I had such a bad hand...
Hah! And I had a high card. Dealer, you're just messing with me.
Yeah, yeah, I'll get started--wait, I didn't lose? I had a high card!
Damn it, I--wait, how did someone have worse than me? Oh, wow.
...I'm just not sure what to make of you anymore, Dealer. You give me trash, and the rest of them burning trash.
And they say men are tall! You're enough woman for the whole table, sweetie.
You said you don't get out much? Guess men like short women...that makes things awkward for me.
You know, I tend to turn heads with my height alone. Better not invite you to the ship, or you'll steal my thunder.
From what I know of men, you're as tall as one...and built like them, too. Don't worry, you wear it well--so does Gascogne!
Hibiki's a teenie-weenie man I know. I guess you represent the opposite end of the spectrum on both counts.
Well, howdy, pardner, how d'ya--do...
What are you lugging that big men's gun around for--ack!
Well, aren't you spunky! You even brought a model g--eek!
Uh...where are you pointing that thing? Are you--wait--eek! Don't!
Ooh! Ooh! Are you doing it again? Do it again!
Ooh, Aimee's turn! Show us that trick again!
Aimee! You're so cool! How do you shoot like that? Do that trick again!
Give us a show, girl! That last time was incredible!
I'd call you crazy for this sort of thing, but how could I when you defy death like it's nothing?
You're just so awesome! I can't get enough of this!
Can you do it a third time, hotshot? Yeah, probably.
I could watch you do this all day. My heart jumps every time!
Uh, Aimee? Are you sure you want to keep doing that? You nearly got hit last time...and your targets are getting smaller.
Um, it's OK, Aimee! You've been very impressive! Just go out on top, you know?
...Are you sure about this, Aimee? After...last time? Don't kill yourself...
Uh--don't go all the way just for my sake. What you did was cool, but, um...well, you'll be fine.
Well, I guess if you've come this far, you might as well finish the job. Go for it.
I'd expect nothing less, cutie. Be sure to wow us!
Might as well seal the deal, even if it's just your thong. You can do it, honey!
Seems we've got similar taste in underwear. Shame you're about to shoot it right off, but at least it'll look cool.
That tan is something else, and your energy is boundless! Most Mejarians opt for pale, as you can see...
Barnette's kind of tan like you are. She's cute, too, so women can pull it off!
Slow down there, tiger. That energy is going to turn you into a tan smear on the ground.
Tan is certainly a look on Mejare, but pale is the norm for us...where'd you say you were from? Planet Austria?
...Are you alright there, honey? With the knife and all?
...You know, I carry the rapier mostly for fashion...maybe you could relegate that knife to the same thing?
...Could you maybe put down the knife, sweetheart? Hey, are you listening?
What a weirdo...knives are just as deadly as swords, with none of the style.
Better keep my sword on hand, with this nutcase on the scene.
Hey, hey, hey! Check out the all-purple look. That's a new one...
Hey, honey, color contrasts show confidence. Would I look nearly as stunning if this dress matched my hair?
Purple hair's certainly got an exotic appeal...too bad mine is boring old blonde. As for the matching outfit, I don't follow the logic.
Quite the exotic color scheme you've got there, sweetie. Too bad you forgot to mix it up at all.
You're pale as marble, dearie! Do they not have a sun on this "Japan" planet?
Are you...flickering? Are you some kind of hologram? That might explain your skin tone.
You OK there, sweetheart? You look a little pale...and non-corporeal.
And I thought Mejarians liked the pale look! This "Japan" planet puts us to shame.
Check out that outfit! Going for the natural look? So would I, if Mejare had much of nature.
Did you just piece that outfit together from bits you found in a forest? It doesn't even look that bad, but...it's certainly all-natural.
If only Mejare had the same verdant natural resources as Earth. Perhaps then I could try to emulate your all-natural style.
Mejare's a little too wasteful to have the greenery for me to dress like you do. You can see how little we wear to compensate.
Hey, girlie, someone told me you're a model on Earth...is that true? I'd like to get in on that...
You're pretty cute, honey, but I hear people like legs on their models...better hope I don't hit the scene.
Hey now, sweetheart. You're cute, but there's no need to brag about being a model...not when a Mejarian's on the scene.
Don't be so full of yourself, Miss Model...I'd be a model, too, if not for Mejare's pesky little corrupt government.
Is that so? Well, Ami, you've got to let me know how to become an Earth model. I'm a bit of an outlaw on Mejare, after all.
Thanks for the tip, Meia. Leave it to you to gather a little intel on our friends here...how's life as an Earth model, honey?
Ooh, she's a model? Now I'm curious...that was always my dream job, after all.
You're, uh, looking a little pink there. And what's up with those ears?
I know I joke about Earth girls being aliens, but, uh, you really do look kind of weird. What's with all the...fur?
Wait, did they say you're a...a hedgehog or something? Is that some kind of animal? That would explain the, uh, pink...and ears.
...I really can't make heads or tails of you. You kind of look like you should have a tail, what with that fur and all.
Ooh, you're into art? Do you think you could paint a portrait of me? Maybe frame it in your collection to capture my eternal beauty?
Ooh, so you're an artist? I know a particularly handsome man that can paint, too...think you could capture me better?
Did you say you go to school with men? I was never that big on school--except for art, where we could finally appreciate beauty!
Students tend to be such bores--like that egghead Parfet. But an art student? Now we're talking--my whole body is art!
How's a young little thing like you a model if you're still in school? I've got modeling potential, but it's hard for pirates to land a job.
A student and a model? And here I am, with all my beauty, and still a lowly criminal. At least I have my wonderful piloting skills.
If only my circumstances let me be the beautiful model I've always dreamed of being! Guess I'll have to settle for death-defying pirate.
You're a lucky one, Earth-girl. I never had the benefit of much schooling, nor the opportunity to be a model. So cherish what you've got!
Hey there, Plain-Jane. What's brought you here, with all your layers? Looking to overcome some shyness?
Exhibit A of Earth girls' ridiculous conservatism. Can't you appreciate your own body instead of hiding it? Must be men doing this to you.
What's up, cutie? You seem to be making every effort to hide that cuteness, actually. Just look at those packed-on layers.
I guess I'd be a little shyer about my body if I had your height and plain looks, but come on. Confidence makes any woman look better!
Hey there, short stuff. I think you might actually be shorter than Hibiki, which is a challenge even for women.
You said you fight "Titans"? I imagine that's everyone, considering your stature.
"Titans," huh? You mean like me next to you? Or anyone, really?
How's the weather down there, at the very bottom of Earth? You really need to drink your milk, honey.
...See, this is why I'm going to be the Fama for Barnette. I don't want our daughters growing up all short from lack of milk.
Ooh, do you really report the news? Be sure to get my good side--oh wait, that's every side!
Hey there, Jumpsuit. Someone said you're a reporter--but this pirate doesn't mind a little publicity!
I've been in the media for much worse than a few glory shots, so don't think I'm afraid of that camera, newsgirl.
Hey, newsie, I've got all the story you need right here. Your Earth viewers have never seen a body like mine!
Hey, what's all this about the middle of Earth? Is there a spot underground that only you elf-people get to live in?
And I call Meia pale. You look almost ghostly...is that just the way you elves are?
Hey, what's up with those pointy ears? And the pale, Meia-like skin? You're a strange one, "elf" girl.
So you call yourself an elf, right? Is that another word for "Earthling with crazy ears"? Because you look human otherwise.
Hey, what's all this about the middle of Earth? Is there a spot underground that only you elf-people get to live in?
And I call you pale, Meia. Arwen here looks almost ghostly...is that just the way elves are?
Hey, what's up with those pointy ears? And that pallid skin? You're a strange one, "elf" girl.
So you call yourself an elf, right? Is that another word for "Earthling with crazy ears"? Because you look human otherwise.
What'd you say you lived in? An M-M-O--ripgah? I can't keep track of all that.
Did you say you lived in a computer or something like that? Sounds like Heaven to Parfet, with how much she tinkers with machines.
So what's it like inside a computer? Do you have to wear a rubber suit to avoid getting electrocuted?
You live inside a game, right? And now you're playing a game? Is this whole place a game I've stepped inside?
I really thought I'd be the most lightly-dressed woman here, but there you go showing me up on that front.
Way to dispel my stereotypes of Earth girls being overdressed. You wear even less than I do.
Hey, I understand wanting to show a little skin, but you can't walk around in a bikini all day. Even Barnette doesn't go that far.
Even my darling little Barnette covers herself up better than you do...and she's got a reputation for dressing flimsily.
...You OK there, schoolgirl? You look a little on edge...especially when you look my way.
Looking a little bug-eyed there, honey. Too much coffee this morning?
Uh, you OK, Ayano? Your eyes are all shifty, like somebody's watching you.
...Could you settle down there, girlie? You're giving me the stink-eye like I killed someone. It's creeping me out.
Normally I'd say rock the skin color you have, but wow. Pink is not an attractive color...not that pink.
And here I thought Mejarians were the ones with the exotic body colors. Earth girls are breaking out the bright pink skin!
Why's your skin all gross-looking and pink? Like, <i.really pink. It's distracting...so is that eyepatch, too.
Not to be outdone, Earth starts showing this Mejarian just how bizarre its colors can truly get. Next on the agenda: pink skin.
Oho--a fellow blonde! Good to see them running around on Earth--we've got to stick together!
Hey there, cutie! Always good to see more lovely blonde women running around. Got to keep each other safe from those jealous brunettes.
Ooh, is blonde your natural color? It's not as exotic as some of Mejare's other hair colors, but it's certainly appealing to be wrapped in gold.
What, was "Blonde Canary" taken? Because that's what I would advertise, if I were you.
I was gonna say something about that cool dark skin, but apparently...you're just some sort of image? What's that about?
You're..."virtual"? Listen, honey, you can't just assume we know what these things mean. Piloting's a busy life, you know!
Wait, so you're not really here, and you're some kind of "virtual" avatar? Earth has really gotten advanced from all the technology they keep stealing.
Hey, if we can just use computers to project ourselves here, why didn't anyone tell me? I had to fly all the way here!
Ooh, the black-and-white look is a classic! Very striking and confident with that contrast. And such a cute little bow!
Maybe it's just me, but you've got a Mejarian sense of style! Clashing colors, nice and sexy and revealing! A woman after my own heart.
Ooh, that's a cute outfit, Blake! I love this dress, but I don't have anything quite as fancy as all that clashing-colors business.
Mmm...the lace, the contrast, the heels! I like your style, Blake! Not bad for an Earth girl.
Way to go and expose your entire midriff there, Blake. Who do you think you are, Dita? Me?
Nice vest you're rocking there, honey. But you forgot to cover up your midsection...like me.
Taking a few fashion tips from me, are you, Blake? What with that midriff fully on display and all.
Well, aren't you looking more exposed than usual? But as far as exposure goes, the midsection's a good choice.
Do you seriously fight those "vampire" things? I mean, you just don't look all that imposing.
Ooh, you're kind of cute! Is that how you kill "vampires"? Just making them let their guard down with your adorable face?
So what's it take to kill these "vampires"? Can't you just get the military to shoot them or something? You don't seem all that special.
For a girl called "Buffy," you sure seem awful willowy. You do have a cute face, so maybe that's your strategy for killing those vampire things.
What's up, Miss Pantsuit? You sure laugh a lot for someone dressed so prim-and-proper.
You some kind of businesswoman, Miss Yuck-it-up? How could such an esteemed professional be so depraved as to play this?
Hey there, Chuckles! You look more conservative than I've ever dreamed of being...and yet here you are, stripping with me.
Something funny, Miss Formalwear? Make sure this nasty pirate doesn't put a ransom on your very professional head.
Yeesh. Being as beautiful as I am, I try to let other girls down easy, but...you're hard to look at.
...Ew. I really can't tell where your face begins and your body ends.
...It's times like these that I really appreciate how fortunate I am to be born this beautiful. Take a look at the alternative.
As if you weren't ugly enough, you've got this horrible look in your eyes. What's your problem?
You know, I'd call Meia the strong, silent type...but she still speaks occasionally.
Slow on the uptake? The "strong, silent type" doesn't mean literally never speaking, you know.
Oh, don't feel bad. I know you're speechless at the sight of me--but I'll do enough talking for both of us!
Stunned into speechlessness? I'm flattered, but really, honey, you can talk to me. I won't mind.
Hey, Chell. If I'm the most gorgeous woman you've ever met, don't say anything.
See, Meia, I think you do the "strong, silent type" thing pretty well. Chell here is an example of taking it too far.
Slow on the uptake? The "strong, silent type" doesn't mean literally never speaking, you know.
Oh, don't feel bad. I know you're speechless at the sight of me--but I'll do enough talking for both of us!
Stunned into speechlessness? I'm flattered, but really, honey, you can talk to me. I won't mind.
Hey, Chell. If I'm the most gorgeous woman you've ever met, don't say anything.
Hey, Eyebags, you gonna stay awake all game? You look like you're drifting away already.
Talk about never leaving the house. You look like you've never seen sunlight--and you're dozing off as we speak!
Gotta be honest, sweetie--between the pale skin and the vacant look in your eyes, you're really reminding me of a zombie.
So do you work super hard all day at your job? Why do you look all gaunt and drowsy? Get some beauty sleep, woman.
...You know, I was shown films as a girl about how men were horrible monsters. You're about what they looked like in those.
Ew! Eek! G-get away! Stop! What are you?
...I really came here to meet some Earth women. Not...whatever this is supposed to be. Besides terrifying.
...What the hell am I looking at? I wanted some cute girls, not a--a mechanical monstrosity!
You're a robot? So like, you're Pyoro if he were designed by a blind woman?
Ooh, you've got quite the set of muscles on you. Shame Meia's not here. She'd totally melt right in front of you!
Check out those legs, hot stuff! You look like you could lift up the whole table with those things alone--good thing Meia's not here to fawn over you.
Omigosh, you should meet Meia, my boss--she's really icy, but women with muscles totally get her going. And she'd try not to show it!
Hey, Miss Muscles, you into women? Because my squadron leader Meia is all about exercise, and she desperately needs a girlfriend.
Oh, dear. I can see where this is going, Ice Queen.
Flirting, are we Meia? I figured as much. Best to let the lovebirds just figure things out on their own.
Meia, honey, you're just setting yourself up for disappointment. Earth girls don't like each others' bodies the way we do.
Ooh, you're so cute when a woman actually gets you going! She'll deny it now, Chun, but Meia here is totally into you.
A witcher, eh? Is that Earth dialect for witch? Because I got called a witch for possession of Duero's sex book.
Is it witcher or witch? Or, shall I say, which is it?
So is a "witcher" even witchier than a witch? I've been called a witch just for wanting to see what men have got in their pants.
Forgive me for not being impressed with the term "witcher." How could I be when all it takes for that on Mejare is a libido?
Ooh, you're a cutie! Yet surprisingly sturdy on your feet, what with all that armor. Don't bowl me right over!
Hi there, darling! You must be pretty tough to lug all that armor around. Afraid I'll stab you?
What's with that armor, sweetheart? You'd be a lot cuter without it...I know I'm a pirate, but I'd never kill someone as cute as you.
Adorable hairstyle, cute face--but all that armor! You a soldier, dear? Oh, please forgive my horrid piracy!
Where'd you say you were from? Planet Korea? Well then, it seems Korea and Mejare share a fashion sense...
You're a cutie, Miss Bodysuit, if a little on the short side. Is that just how they make women over on Planet Korea?
If only Meia were here. She dresses just like you do, D.Va...we should find out who wears it better!
You're an adorable little thing, D.Va! All wrapped up in that cute bodysuit, just like a certain other pilot I know.
I don't even know you, girlie, but you seem dressed up for a special occasion all the same. Feeling sexy today?
Hey, cutie. Is it a holiday on planet Korea? Because you look different from usual.
This "Korea" planet of yours has got quite the range of fashion. I swear I've seen you running around in something else.
What's up, D.Va? That's a cute outfit--but it doesn't seem quite like your usual fare. What's the occasion?
Where'd you say you were from? Planet Korea? Well then, it seems Korea and Mejare share a fashion sense...
You're a cutie, Miss Bodysuit, if a little on the short side. Is that just how they make women over on Planet Korea?
Well, everyone, cards on the table. Who wears the whole bodysuit look better--D.Va or my miserable old boss here?
You're an adorable little thing, D.Va! All wrapped up in that cute bodysuit, just like another pilot I know...who might be sitting here.
Ohoho. Miss Boring-old-Brunette puts on a fancy store-bought dress and suddenly thinks she's better than the rest of us.
So, "Princesses" are like rulers, right? So what makes you so special, girlie?
I've never subscribed to the idea of royalty. What, some plain-jane with a chip on her shoulder just decides she's better than me?
So what if I had to steal my dress? I'm still more beautiful than Miss Too-Big-for-her-Brooches here, with her servants and fancy title.
Oh good, a fellow blonde...and tall, too. Wasn't sure Earth girls could fit either category.
You're not a bad looker yourself, honey. Must be our wonderful blonde genetics that inform the rest of our bodies!
You solve mysteries, is that right? Well...there's no mystery about how wonderful it is to be blonde.
Ho-hum. Another blonde in a dress...I'm just kidding, you're still cute.
Way to half-ass your outfit, honey. You look like you picked out whatever fell on you when you opened your closet!
...So is the "zero-effort" look how you attract Earth men? Have I been going at this all wrong?
I should have known--men are too simple to understand complex outfits, so they respond better to cobbled-together looks like yours.
Gotta be honest here, sweetheart--you don't look like the type to be playing this. Those glasses aren't helping you pick out appealing clothes.
...Can I maybe just call you "DMG" for short? Because Dark Magician Girl is a hell of a mouthful.
...Don't you have an actual name? You know, like the one your Fama gives you?
You've really got to give yourself a snappier nickname, dearie...men aren't bright enough to remember that many words.
If you really are a magician, color me interested...but that clunky name could use a shortening or two.
What'd you say you raised? Those little Poker--whatevers? Is that why you're playing this game?
Hey, dearie, that exotic blue hair will take you further than weird animal training--you should be a model for shampoo or something.
Mejare has barely any animals at all, so this whole "pokey-mon" thing is lost on me. And they just do whatever you say?
So could you train men the way you do these poker-whatevers? Because that would be quite interesting...
And what do we have here? An Earth pirate? And with a sword, to boot! Interesting...
I see even Earth pirates understand the subtle elegance of a blade! And you've got some luxurious hair yourself.
Oho--a fellow pirate? I'd absolutely love to have a drink later--maybe you could teach me how to handle my sword better.
Well, now! You Earth pirates don't dress like we do on Mejare--but your choice of weapon isn't too far off. Can you show me around?
Little Miss Princess wants to play strip poker, does she? Well, I hope you don't mind if this nasty pirate holds you hostage.
Looking a little out of your element, Miss Blueblood. Gonna prove that you're really better than the rest of us like your title implies?
Look at Miss Princess, lugging around a scepter just to prove she's better than the peons. We'll see how you enjoy stripping down like us.
Royals really get on my nerves, you know...mostly because I'm not one, despite actually being better-looking.
Oh? And what do we have here, besides the most adorably shy little woman I've ever seen?
Such a cutie...and in a traditional-looking dress! Hard to believe someone so shy would even be here.
Something wrong, honey? You've hardly been looking me in the eye. It's OK, I don't bite.
Why so shy, Elizabeth? Confidence makes women ten times as beautiful--just look at me!
So what's your story? You can cast magic spells or something? If it's true, sign me up--it'll be another wonderful thing about me!
Some might call my beauty magical...I'm inclined to agree.
Hey, honey. Cast a spell on me...one that makes me even prettier. Now that would be magic!
Alright, I've seen enough crazy Paksis-magic to believe your tales. But why don't you put your money where your mouth is?
Beautiful hair, makeup, spacefaring? With both of us running around, this table's going to get sick of the archetype.
Do we have a fellow star-crossing seductress on our hands? I'm not sure there's enough meat for both of us.
Hey, good-lookin'. Trying to steal my thunder with the "seductress-from-space" angle? I don't mind--I like women, too.
You didn't doll yourself up like that just to please some men, did you? Come show this fellow spacefarer what you can do.
Hey, Kitty-cat. You're supposed to strip during the game, not before it.
Nice Halloween costume, Kitty, but maybe you should have picked something a little more complex for this game.
Not too interested in winning, huh, Kitty-cat? Unless you've brought some yarn-balls you plan on counting.
I only know about cats from Mejare's zoos...they only showed the females, of course. But they were definitely more covered than you are.
So, Miss Kitty, you, uh, going to shave your bottom fur now? ...I'd like that.
Knowing that that's fur now makes me really want to see you shaved...Mejare likes shaving.
Is the bottom fur going now? Because I hate hair...except on the head.
Please tell me you're shaving everything else. That's sort of the style on Mejare, so it's what I know.
Dear god, girl, you'd cower if a light breeze rolled in. What's the big deal with a little exposure?
You are just so cute. How do you feel about women, little Miss? Do my breasts bother you?
Shy around nudity, sweetie? Did the big, bad Earth men beat this into you? Just enjoy yourself...
You're such a nervous wreck that I just feel bad for teasing you. Way to ruin my fun.
Jeez, you're terrified. Maybe men do eat women's livers.
...Are men actually anything to be afraid of? Sure, they're big and lumbering, but they seem kind of slow.
Calm down, would you? Yeesh. Maybe Mejare was right about men, considering the state they've got this girl in.
Hey, I've dealt with my fair share of male soldiers. They're nothing to be super afraid of...too stupid.
Jeez, what a head case. Good thing she's got her girlfriend here to keep her in check.
Running, running, running. We're not trying to kill you here, you know.
Time for take two, everyone. Better than the first, perhaps?
And there she goes. Poor little thing, beaten down by the world.
What's up, Four-Feet-Four-Eyes? You look like someone brought you here at gunpoint.
Oh, look, the egghead love child of Parfet and Dita--nerdy and and eccentric! How's the weather at the bottom of the earth?
I keep trying to look over your outfit, but my eyes just keep moving too fast and missing it. Did your Fama not produce milk, shorty?
You're such a cute little bespectacled spectacle--but damn if you don't look eleven. Where's the other two feet of your body?
What's your story, Miss Highlights? Got any gum to share?
Hey, toss me a piece of that gum, cutie. I could use a snack while you tell me all about your "San Fransokyo" planet.
Just gonna blow bubbles all day, or are you actually going to strip? Either way, I wouldn't mind having some myself...
You seem a little sour, Miss Gumball. If those bubbles aren't cheering you up, just give me the rest to chew.
I understand, dear. You're so stunned by my beauty that you hid your own face in shame. I'm sure you're still cute!
Don't hide that pretty little face on my account, honey. You've certainly got a beautiful figure.
Nice little bodysuit you've got there, even if you plan on being the Masked Woman. I know a sugar-and-ice girl with your fashion sense.
You've got a lot of sass for someone who won't show her face, Miss Masked. Hiding some grisly injury, or just your own embarrassment?
...Look, honey. Makeup is a girl's best friend, but...it's possible to get a little too close to your friends.
Dear god. Did you break into your Fama's makeup closet and start applying whatever you could find? Your friends are letting you down.
I guess I never appreciated how light with makeup I can be with my natural beauty. Here we see the alternative...
Check out Miss Makeup over here. Somehow she made it through childhood without hearing the expression "less is more."
Check out that messy hair...and adorable student outfit! Did you say you're a witch?
Watch out, ladies, we've got a full-blown magician on our hands. On Mejare you get called a witch for saying men aren't the worst thing ever.
A witch, eh? Forgive my doubts...that jealous old hag of a judge called me a witch just for having that anatomy book!
Awww! She even brought a little magic wand to complete the costume! You're so cute, Miss Witch.
Between you and that time I got called a witch for showing interest in men, witches are just irresistible these days.
So what are these "ninjas" all about, huh? Disappearing into the night doesn't sound useful in a game like this.
Don't tell me your going to use those ninja skills to hide your body, now.
Certainly an impressive profile, Miss Ninja. Think you could show us just how impressive?
Does "ninja" just mean you wear a headband? Sounds like a lofty title for my Barnette to accidentally fall under.
Hey, dearie, no reason to come out knives-swinging. I've got my rapier sheathed like a civilized woman.
