Wha--oh my gosh! Magic? Do it again! That was so cool!
What did you--ooh! Ooh! You really are a fairy! Show me some more magic!
Omigosh! You weren't kidding around! Magic is so cool! Do something else!
...Oh my God. Magic? Well, then...what else can you do, hm?
Don't let people tell you those aren't cute! Think of Misty, with her poor little Plutonian ones. Mine were much bigger at her age!
What would Misty think of her "big sister" exposing herself like this? Eh, she's a total flirt, she'd be fine with it.
Misty'd be cute if she weren't so lecherous. She should save that for us filthy Mejarians.
Hey, you're still bigger than Misty! And a bunch of other women you've convinced yourself you're smaller than. Maybe you should be with her?
I don't have to, dear. Meia's already convinced they do.
It doesn't matter how many compliments you pay to her breasts, honey. She's a total head case about them.
Oh, I've told her many times that her breasts are just fine. Nothing penetrates her ridiculuous neuroses.
If I did, I'd just be confirming what Meia already inexplicably believes.
Seriously? Why do Earth girls wear so much?
Take a fashion tip from a Mejarian. Less is more.
I've half a mind to borrow one of Barnette's guns.
Meia hates losing a lot more than I do. She'd be furious with you!
Seriously? Why do Earth girls wear so much?
Take a fashion tip from a Mejarian. Less is more.
I've half a mind to borrow one of Barnette's guns.
Aren't you furious with her, Meia? I know how much losing gets to you.
Wha--oh, goddamnit! Just take things off in a proper order!
Hey, I came here to see some Earth nudity! I don't appreciate being toyed around with!
Yeah, yeah, hotshot. Real clever. You definitely played this game and didn't want people to see you naked.
This must be how people feel around me. Clinging to accessories...at least I have a body worth teasing.
I hate it when people bounce around with the importance of what they take off. Let the audience know what to expect!
...OK. I agree. You don't want to have fun.
...Point taken. No fun for you. Got it.
...OK, now you're just actively trying to make this awful for yourself.
W-wha--but...why? You should be having fun, not torturing yourself!
...You'd still look sexy with that on. It's not what I meant by stripping...or fun.
O-oh, are you putting the guns down? I-I promise I won't touch them.
(Oh, thank God...) Er, Revy, good choice there. Good choice.
Hey, uh, now that you're disarmed, try to relax a little, would you? Instead of yelling at us.
I was hoping tonight wouldn't end with someone getting shot. Don't we all just want to see each other naked?
Atta girl! Now show me something magical! ...Besides this.
These vortices are pretty fantastic, but it's the end result I care about.
You really are something else. I've already grown accustomed to your magic vortices!
All that magic, but all I care about is the outfit waiting for me. I never thought I'd meet someone like you!
...Seriously, do you have any control over this? Even a little? Or is it all luck?
...Talk about living life up to chance, by the way. This is so weird...and I'm a pilot. I've seen weird.
There she goes with another vortex. Life is just a game of luck to our little fashionista here.
Too bad this isn't the spectacle it used to be. But the random chance does keep it interesting!
Let's see some skin, ~name~. Earth men know all about you anyway, right?
Don't Earth women strip down all the time? I thought men were insatiable sex-fiends, after all.
You know, after masturbating in public, this just doesn't seem like a fair tradeoff to me.
That's the way, ~name~. Remember, it's the losers who get a reward here.
You have a secret? Well, here's your chance to keep me interested, Plain-Jane.
You haven't impressed so far, Plain-as-Day. So color me interested with this "secret" of yours.
I'm listening, dearie. You're so average that I'm honestly willing to buy that you have a "secret."
Unless your secret is a third breast, I just can't see you wowing me, dear.
And what have we here? Ooh, you're more depraved than I thought, Miss Vampire Hunter.
Heeheehee! Undoing your bra beneath your shirt, you little tease? A woman after my own heart...if I wore bras.
That's a sexy little move there, honey. I'd try it, too, but bras have never been to my tastes in the first place.
So are you trying to be fun and sexy, or just throwing us all off? I'd certainly prefer the former.
Pfft! So much for the cool-and-calculated act! Even I wouldn't stoop that low...maybe.
There's no need, dear. You're showing your true colors already.
OK, even I wouldn't count my makeup. It's just luck, honey, don't be so sore about it.
Look, honey, if you have to wear enough makeup that it counts as clothing, it wouldn't save your looks in the first place.
Heeheehee! What was that again? Too-ayy-jolee?
Too--too-ay-julee? Did I get it right? Help me out here, cutie.
Tooayyjolie? Was that it? Oh, all your words just melt together into a chocolate fondue of language!
Too--tooayy, uh, what was that? I mean, it was adorable, but I didn't really catch it.
Teehee! I have no clue what you just said, but you've got to teach me, Marinette! This'll drive my girlfriend wild.
I can just picture the look on Barnette's face when I start whispering these sweet nothings. Could you teach me?
What was that? Anyway, omigosh, Marinette, you have to give me some French lessons! Barnette will melt in my arms!
Whatever you just said, my girlfriend Barnette would absolutely melt, it's so romantic! Won't you please teach me?
Where would you say you rank on our crew, Meia? I hear some of the low-rankers whisper about how they have a crush on you.
You try to act all modest, but you are our leader. You love the spotlight...and our crewmates love you.
You know Valore's head-over-heels for you, right? She was so worried about you while we were gone.
You're too lovable for your own good, Meia. I think a lot of our pilots like how cold you are with them!
Do you have any idea how many of our crewmates would kill to see you zip that thing off up close and personal?
Oooh, the dress! Now we're talking! ...What's the matter, Misato?
Aww, someone's embarrassed even through the booze! What's got you all shy suddenly, huh?
Even half in the bag like this, you're all nervous. Hiding something under that dress?
Hey, Misato, what's wrong? You look a little on edge suddenly, even between burps.
Ooh, that's a nifty trick, dear! You can bet I'd give it a shot if I could...do you think I should wear a bodysuit?
I've always felt I'm too pillowy and soft for a bodysuit, but you really make it your own! Could it pull if off, too, sweetie?
Hey, Miss Gravity, I was really like the look of your figure all stuffed into that suit. Do you think I'd look good in the same thing?
Mejare has a thing for bodysuits, you know...I wonder if I should get myself one. There's just no tease to it, you know?
Maybe it's just the antigravity, but this girl's lit a fire in my heart, Leader! Do you think I should wear a suit like yours?
Hey, Leader, this girl's making bodysuits look good even for a woman with some meat on her. Should I wear one?
I think you've managed to make bodysuits boring for me, Meia. This girl is making me want to get one now!
Maybe I should abandon this silly dress and opt for a bodysuit like yours and Ochako's, Meia--just bare it all! What do you say?
I know I'm not as slender and lithe as you, Leader, but neither is Ochako. Should I get myself a bodysuit?
Is that your own special die, or does it just work for anyone? ...Can I try?
So if I rolled that thing, could it give me a whole new outfit? I mean, I do love my dress, but hey...I've already lost.
Now I'm starting to get curious about that die of yours. Would it work if I rolled it?
Does that die work solely for you? What if I just snatched it like the pirate I am?
But don't worry about all that! Let's see what outfit's next, cutie!
Another vortex, another wonderful piece of fashion to ogle. I'm so lucky!
You call yourself the lucky one, but I came here hoping to see some cool fashion choices.
Simply magical. My luck that I'd meet you, not these vortices. Things just work out for me!
Would you quit it with the game already? It's not like there's a prize!
...You're just gonna keep this up, aren't you?
Are you trying to tell me that my little masturbation show did nothing for you? Men are so weird!
Seriously, though, did I turn you on? I'm still trying to figure out men's sexualities.
Good job, ~name~. Now clean yourself up and report for duty.
Now stop fooling around and report to the hangar! That was my Meia impression. How do you like it?
I'll be taking that image back to the Nirvana with me. Consider it a pirate's plunder.
Anytime you want to feel really good, give me and Barnette a call.
Good job, ~name~. Now clean yourself up and report for duty.
Now stop fooling around and report to the hangar! Thought that was Meia talking, didn't you?
I'll be taking that image back to the Nirvana with me. Consider it a pirate's plunder.
Anytime you want to feel really good, give me and Barnette a call.
A-ah! See? I told you!
...Yeah, definitely making sure Barnette doesn't go this far.
Guess we all knew that was coming, but I wanted to believe you'd pull it off.
...I think I prefer Barnette's level of gun-hobby. As in, not shooting herself.
Oooow! Hey, shut up, you freak!
Ow! What was that for? Ugh!
Oooooow! Ooh, the nerve of some people! Take your weird voice powers and beat it, freak!
AM I TALKING TOO LOUD? I THINK I JUST WENT DEAF.
...That ended as quickly as it began. What was that?
You don't even seem bothered! W-why didn't you say you could do stuff like that?
...And this sort of thing just comes naturally to you? Didn't bat an eye?
OK. Yes. It's over now, apparently. Very enlightening, Elizabeth. Never judge by appearances.
Didn't think you'd be quite so explosive. But I'm glad you are!
See? I knew you had a heart. Don't you feel liberated now?
Now you'll be able to focus next mission. Or maybe you'll have wandering eyes!
There's nothing like your smile. Except for Barnette's.
What, she's leaving? Stay a while! We can talk about woman relationships together!
Hey, don't leave so soon, dear! You're a steal yourself--I can tell you more about more girlfriend!
Aww, don't leave, honey! We just got to meet each other, and you spent it all underneath Morrigan's butt!
Leave if you must. I guess I'm not beautiful enough to warrant sticking around.
I knew Earth girls could love each other the way we do. Men are just so superfluous!
Talk about a Mejarian power couple. You're stronger than the men I know anyway!
I like the idea of men just picking me up...but it seems like you two could do that anyway.
I guess Earth isn't so different from Mejare after all. Two strong women in love! ...Like me and Barnette.
And she just plops down like a doofus! You get cuter the longer I look at you, darling.
Have a good time, Miss Gravity? Seems like you lost control of your little floating maneuver.
I think you might be the most adorable girl I've ever met, from stuffing your figure into that suit to just plopping on the ground.
Ha! I guess you really have overcome your embarrassment, to just drop down like that. Or maybe that was an accident.
Wha--ew! W-what's all that blue stuff? Don't get it on me! It's gross!
Ack! F-fluid! B-blue fluid everywhere! Is it poisonous?
Eeek! V-Vriska! What is this? What did you do? Why are you leaking blue stuff?
Ack! K-keep that stuff away from me! It's corrosive, isn't it? M-magic corrosive blue fluid!
Do a lady a favor and let her know how she compares.
Let's see what Earth's finest is working with. That's how you'd describe yourself, right?
Time to see if years of space colonization have changed women in the ways that matter.
Dita would be a blubbering mess right now. I could never bring her here--Meia will be annoyed, but Dita's just too sweet for this place.
Do a lady a favor and let her know how she compares.
Let's see what Earth's finest is working with. That's how you'd describe yourself, right?
Time to see if years of space colonization have changed women in the ways that matter.
Dita would be a blubbering mess right now. We could never bring her here--she's just too sweet for this place.
I guess firing straight up makes it a little easier to hit your mark. Must be a breeze for you.
You sure are confident. I know I act that way, but you really put your money where your mouth is.
I'm really no good with weapons at all...ground combat is an awful mess. That's why my Dread is so fun to pilot!
You're still so cool. But with this sort of thing, maybe it's best not to push your luck...
What are you planning, Miss Pixie? You've got a mischievous look in your eye...well, more mischievous than usual.
You look like you're plotting something, Kyu. Mind making it known to the rest of us?
Hey, Miss Pixie. Stop going on about nonsense like usual and show those cute fairy breasts of yours.
What are you on about now? Stop stalling for time and show your chest, Miss Pixie. I don't have all evening.
I'm telling you, you and Valore would be such a cute couple! And I think she likes you.
You need a girlfriend before you boil over completely. I bet Valore would be all over you--and she loves formations just as much!
So self-conscious. You know what I think? You should be the cream to Valore's chocolate.
Misty's all over you, but she's a little young, don't you think? Now Valore, she's your type. A fellow squadron leader!
Well, Meia? Are you going to do it, with my hungry eyes boring into you?
You heard Elizabeth, Leader. Are you going to show your breasts to your second-in-command?
Liz is right, Meia--this is very awkward. It's only, what, the hundredth time I've seen you naked?
Oh, my! Not Meia's breasts! Oh, Elizabeth, why must you remind me of this horror?
There she goes again. Some girls never learn...even if they've got magical dice.
The gimmick's played out, honey. You can just be normal like the rest of us.
It doesn't matter how brilliant your light show is, darling...people only get dazzled once.
You'd be surprised what humans can get used to, dear. This isn't impressive anymore.
Want me to shift around a little? Spread something? What do men want?
I've got to find out what makes men tick.
I can't believe men's masturbation is really that simple. Mix it up a little, jeez.
What exactly does a man want a good view of when he masturbates, huh? I'm not shy about it.
Hey, 9S. You're thinking about how much you want to...well, you know. Aren't you?
I just can't get over the look on your face, honey. A robot in ecstasy! Marvelous.
Seriously, I'm wondering what a robot thinks about when he masturbates. I can't even figure out human men.
It's hard to find this erotic when I'm confused about your gender and your mechanics.
I really should've been more cunning...and not gotten bored towards the end.
Guess it's my own fault for just sort of throwing in the towel.
I masturbated to completion and everything, and somehow I'm still feeling unsatisfied.
You're taking this so seriously. You must really want that non-existent reward for winning.
Eep! A-are you OK, Aimee? Do you need help? Is there a doctor in here?
Eek! A-Aimee! Are you OK? Say something!
A-Aimee! What's wrong? Are you hit? Did someone sabotage you?
Ack! Aimee! Are you alright? Is there anything I can get you? Did the gun misfire?
...Yeah. Yeah, I understand now. Sorry.
Eeek! W-what's wrong with your--u-uh, I'm sorry! It's not so bad, really!
...Oh no, they're...interesting. They look great. You look great. It's a style.
Eep! D-don't touch--er, uh, they're--cute! Yes. Very cute.
She won't admit it, but my Leader here's curvy, isn't she? Her vanity is buried pretty deep.
Behold, the only Mejarian without an ounce of vanity. Well, not about her body, anyway.
Think Meia's not as vain as I am? Ask her about her piloting skills.
Isn't she so much cuter with feminine shoulders? Meia's always shooting her looks in the foot...but she's just as proud, if you listen close.
Took you long enough. Couldn't have given me a peek while I was masturbating, huh?
Too bad I couldn't have forced this myself. I'm such a poor representative of Mejare, losing to a man like this.
I'm such a poor representative of Mejare, losing to a man like this and leering at his tube...and also for being a pirate.
Great, now he's getting his tube-thing out. Around men, the horror never ends!
Well, since you're not exactly fully equipped up above, I'm not expecting much.
Did your creators spend any more time developing a full tube for you, dear? I hope so.
I've learned not to trust androids' anatomy, considering last time. What's your situation downstairs?
I know you're artificial, but please try to teach me something about men this time, OK?
Omigosh, Pit, are you showing your tube? It's not a little tiny thing, is it? I hear they can get pretty big!
Hey, Angel-boy...do you have a man-sized tube? If so, I might just fall for your cute little winged self.
Normally I go for tall, strong men...but Hibiki's short like you, and he's kind of cute like you, too. Do you have a decent-sized tube?
It's my understanding men's tubes can vary in size, Pit. I'm willing to overlook shortness in a man if he puts his girth elsewhere.
I'll have you know my thoughts were on Barnette that entire time.
...Hoo. What a workout.
Now that was exhausting. But I feel great!
Just burns the calories right off! Meia should spend less time in the gym and more time in the bedroom. Y'know, if she had a girlfriend.
I can feel the fat just melting away! Good thing, too, since Barnette's a wonderful cook.
...So good.
I never get tired of that sensation.
Not as good as with Barnette, but hey, I was picturing her cute little face.
Definitely better in the hot springs. They boost female hormones, we think.
...Oof. Lost myself for a second there.
Maybe I'll just up and go home now. You've seen enough of me, right?
What a refresher. Always puts me in a good mood.
...Mmm.
...That was great.
Mmm...hm? What? O-oh, uh, thanks, Mahiru! Interesting time to take a photo.
Huh? Did you take a photograph when I came? That's just perverted.
Good to know I'm beautiful even when I lose control of myself. Thanks, Mahiru.
Thanks, honey. I don't have a camera on me, but I'm sure your O-face is just as cute.
Oh, did you take a photo of me cumming? You little pervert. At least I know Barnette's not seeing me at my ugliest.
I'll have you know my thoughts were on Barnette that entire time.
...Hoo. What a workout.
Now that was exhausting. But I feel great!
Just burns the calories right off! This is way better than the gym, Meia.
I can feel the fat just melting away! Good thing, too, since Barnette's a wonderful cook.
...So good.
I never get tired of that sensation.
Not as good as with Barnette, but hey, I was picturing her cute little face.
Definitely better in the hot springs. They boost female hormones, we think.
...Oof. Lost myself for a second there.
Maybe I'll just up and go home now. You've seen enough of me, right?
What a refresher. Always puts me in a good mood.
...Mmm.
...That was great.
...OK, Meia. Try to have fun now that I'm out of the picture.
...You couldn't hope to bring the mood down now, Meia. I'm feeling great.
What, that's it? I did a little more for you than not try to kill you.
Hey, Magno Vivan's pirates are all very sweet ladies, provided you're nice to us...and you're female.
Hey, we don't just kill men indiscriminately...that's the job of Mejarian imperials.
Hey, if you think we're the aggressors, take your little male self down on a trip to Mejare and see how they treat you.
Judging by how closely you're guarding that tube of yours, this seems pretty high-stakes to me.
Funny. To a Tarakkian, there's no higher-stakes environment than being naked next to a ravenous woman.
Well, you've certainly got the enthusiasm for it. Seems short men are always bursting at the seams with energy...guess it's got no space to escape.
I'd rather you work on giving yourself a few extra inches, Pit, but sure, focus on the poker skills.
My Barnette will be so jealous of you...I'll have to calm her down, if you know what I mean.
Congratulations, ~name~. Enjoy your sexual frustration!
Nice meeting you, ~player~. You should come aboard the Nirvana sometime.
See you soon, ~player~. Mejare's lovely this time of year...well, sort of.
Public nudity is so embarrassing. What will I tell my Barnette, with all these strangers having ogled me?
Just you wait. Next time, I won't just stop trying halfway through!
You got lucky, ~name~. I lost interest in the cards after a while.
Congratulations, you've outplayed Jura Basil Elden. More than Mejare's military can say.
Wow, am I feeling refreshed! This was a great idea. Toodle--oo!
This game was every bit as fun as I thought it'd be. And I gave you a great show, right?
Sorry for jerking you around at first, but you made me pay for it, right?
I hope I've improved everyone's opinions of Magno Vivan's Mejarian pirates...or at least their bodies.
Be glad it was me here and not Meia. All you'd have gotten there is some nasty glares.
My Barnette will be so jealous of you...I'll have to calm her down, if you know what I mean.
Congratulations, ~name~. Enjoy your sexual frustration!
Nice meeting you, ~player~. You should come aboard the Nirvana sometime.
See you soon, ~player~. Mejare's lovely this time of year...well, sort of.
Public nudity is so embarrassing. What will I tell my Barnette, with all these strangers having ogled me?
Just you wait. Next time, I won't just stop trying halfway through!
You got lucky, ~name~. I lost interest in the cards after a while.
Congratulations, you've outplayed Jura Basil Elden. More than Mejare's military can say.
Wow, am I feeling refreshed! This was a great idea. Toodle--oo!
This game was every bit as fun as I thought it'd be. And I gave you a great show, right?
Sorry for jerking you around at first, but you made me pay for it, right?
I hope I've improved everyone's opinions of Magno Vivan's Mejarian pirates...or at least their bodies.
I hope you ladies learned a lot from us Mejarians. We'll be back any time you want for a little more diplomacy!
Yeah, we're a little too busy fending off your organ harvesters to bother with invading you.
Hey, remember who's the aggressor here, Earth-man. Or have you all been told we're hogging up your uteri?
First he makes me masturbate for him without returning the favor, and then he calls me aggressive. Men are impossible.
Yeah, yeah, laugh it up, organ-harvester. I don't appreciate being called aggressive by the aggressors.

text.content: Hel-loooo!
Come on inside!
I've been waiting for you, ~name~...
...And so has my girlfriend, Barnette Orangello. Don't try to rhyme that.
This is the man, Jura? He doesn't look all that special to me.
Oh, but he's got that special something I've been looking for, darling...
You mean, he's handsome?
Yes.
Now then, ~name~, did you enjoy your little tour of the Nirvana?
She's a magnificent ship...and I picked out the name myself. Everyone loved it!
You're a lucky man, you know.
After some careful consideration, I've decided you're going the be the man-Oma of my child!
Oh, right, you don't know what that means. What's your Earth word for it?
Ah, yes. Father!
Don't worry, I'm not going to make you raise her.
I wouldn't trust a man around something that delicate anyway...besides me.
See, Mejare is nothing but women. If I have a baby with a man, it'll propel me straight into Mejarian superstardom!
So I need your seed to give me that beautiful child. And I know a fun way to do that!
Now, I'd never be so cruel as to do this behind my darling's back.
Nor would I force her to just sit here and watch you ravish me.
So she'll be joining in on our fun tonight! Men are into that, right?
...I don't know about this, Jura.
Oh, come on, honey, it'll be fun!
Earth women must keep men around for a reason.
No, I mean...you know.
It's just one baby, sweetie...just to make me famous. Don't you want your darling to get the fame she deserves?
Besides...the next one will be ours.
Wha--I--we're starting a family now?
That's how much I love you, dear.
Listen up, ~name~! Time is of the essence.
Normally I'd opt for some foreplay, but you've got a job to do, and it's making both of us happy.
Especially Barnette over here. She's a real saint for letting me do this, after all.
Do anything funny to Jura and there's a bullet with your name on it.
Such a sweetheart.
Ah, there's our little mushroom-looking friend!
And he's standing at attention for us. What a gentleman!
I'm still not sold on these tube-things...
That's OK, sweetie. He doesn't need to sell it to us. We're pirates...
So we take whatever we want.
Agh!
Mmm!
Oh, yes!
That's it, ~name~! Give it to me!
S-so deep inside...men are so beastly!
Oh, I'm overwhelmed! These tubes--they're fantastic!
...I'm not feeling very involved.
Uh...sorry, honey.
Your seed takes more effort to coax out than I thought it would, ~name~.
Luckily, I have some help this evening...
I can't believe this...fighting alongside men is bad enough, but sleeping with them?
Oh, shut up, you're having fun.
These tubes are such a blast to play with! I feel like a girl with a new toy.
Don't say I never did anything for you, Jura.
I never would, darling. I know you don't share my fascination with our little alien here...I just can't help myself.
Ooh, I just remembered what I wanted to try!
I saw this paizuri thing in a book and absolutely fell in love with the idea!
Tell me, ~name~, how does it feel to be between the loveliest set of breasts in the galaxy?
Those poor flat-chested Earth girls could never make this happen for you...
Eek!
O-oh, this must be your seed!
Well, this is wasteful. Don't you have to cum inside me to get me pregnant?
I can't believe Earth women have any children at all when it's this messy.
We Mejarians just head down to the nice doctor and ask her to splice our eggs together.
Come here, Barnette...my darling.
I--mmm...
This is the taste of a man...
Shame on you for wasting precious seed like that, ~name~.
A-agh...
I know you've got some kind of refractive period, or whatever it's called...
So sit tight while I do a lover's duty. And once you're ready again...
I think Barnette deserves her turn.
Some time later...
Agh! N-ngh! T-this thing--
Heavenly, isn't it, dear?
I knew you two would warm up to each other.
It--it actually does feel good...
I told you!
...Go faster.
Feels so warm--I don't--
Wait a second...
Did you just...?
Ohhh, you idiot!
You're supposed to be getting me pregnant!
Is it really so hard to shoot that stuff where you're supposed to for once?
I swear! You try to do something nice, and people just disappoint you.
Well, Mr. Earth-man, I hope you're proud of yourself.
You've managed to waste every drop of seed you spurted out, and thus wasted my evening in the process.
I always get what I want. One way or another, some of that stuff is ending up inside me...
I don't care how long it takes!
